Table of Contents

Name

hello - friendly greeting program

Synopsis

hello [OPTION]...

Description

Print a friendly, customizable greeting.
-h, --help
display this help and exit
-v, --version
display version information and exit
-t, --traditional
use traditional greeting format
-n, --next-generation
use next-generation greeting format
-g, --greeting=TEXT
use TEXT as the greeting message

Reporting Bugs

Report bugs to <bug-hello@gnu.org>.

This is free software: you are free to change and redistribute it. There is NO WARRANTY, to the extent permitted by law.

See Also

The full documentation for hello is maintained as a Texinfo manual. If the info and hello programs are properly installed at your site, the command
info hello

should give you access to the complete manual.
